languages.text: {n}Соломон немедленно ставит руку между вами и мордой пса.{/n} "Любую ответственность за действия кибермастифа несет хозяин. Наказывайте меня — и только меня".
{n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон немедленно ставит руку между вами и мордой пса.{/n} "Любую ответственность за действия кибермастифа несет хозяин. Наказывайте меня — и только меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne quickly puts a hand between you and the dog.{/n} "The cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but only me."

{n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."

languages.text: {n}あなたとグライトの間に、ソロモーンの手が素早く伸びた。{/n}「サイバーマスチフの行動には、制御者である私が全責任を負います。罰するというのなら、私だけを罰してください」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたとグライトの間に、ソロモーンの手が素早く伸びた。{/n}「サイバーマスチフの行動には、制御者である私が全責任を負います。罰するというのなら、私だけを罰してください」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Hand schnellt zwischen dich und den Hund.{/n} "Der Herr eines Cyber-Mastiffs trägt die volle Verantwortung für dessen Taten. Ihr könnt mich bestrafen, aber nur mich."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Hand schnellt zwischen dich und den Hund.{/n} "Der Herr eines Cyber-Mastiffs trägt die volle Verantwortung für dessen Taten. Ihr könnt mich bestrafen, aber nur mich."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne brandit le bras pour s'interposer entre vous et son chien.{/n} « Le maître d'un cyber-mastiff est responsable des actions de son chien. Si vous souhaitez châtier quelqu'un, ce sera moi. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne brandit le bras pour s'interposer entre vous et son chien.{/n} « Le maître d'un cyber-mastiff est responsable des actions de son chien. Si vous souhaitez châtier quelqu'un, ce sera moi. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne mueve la mano rápidamente entre el perro y tú.{/n} «El único responsable de los actos de un cibermastín es su encargado. Puede castigarme si lo desea, pero solamente a mí».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne mueve la mano rápidamente entre el perro y tú.{/n} «El único responsable de los actos de un cibermastín es su encargado. Puede castigarme si lo desea, pero solamente a mí».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙立刻伸出了手，挡在你和他的狗之间。{/n}“如果生化獒犬犯了错，它的主人要付全部责任。你可以惩罚我，但只能惩罚我一个。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙立刻伸出了手，挡在你和他的狗之间。{/n}“如果生化獒犬犯了错，它的主人要付全部责任。你可以惩罚我，但只能惩罚我一个。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un eli, hemen seninle köpek arasına giriyor.{/n} "Bir siber mastifin eylemlerinden yalnızca bakıcısı sorumludur. Cezalandıracaksanız beni cezalandırın. Ancak yalnızca beni."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's hand darts between you and the dog.{/n} "A cyber-mastiff's handler bears sole responsibility for its actions. You may punish me, but me alone."
